snippet.title: Your Toy International Trailer
snippet.description:
"Your Toy" is a mini first person horror game where you have to solve puzzles in order to escape. You will be immersed in a realistic 3D environment with an eerie atmosphere and, through careful observation and by solving clever puzzles, you will slowly unveil the story, little by little.

In puzzle games, designing challenging and engaging puzzles is the most difficult part. We spared no effort in designing, testing and debugging relentlessly with our testers to make them as engaging as possible. We believe players who love puzzle games will have an excellent experience in game process.
